39 using namespace std::chrono_literals;
40 struct _timer_t {
41 std::chrono::duration<long, std::nano> last_time = std::chrono::system_clock::now().time_since_epoch();
42 std::chrono::duration<long, std::nano> period = 1s;
43 int count = -1;
44 bool run_now = false;
45
46 task_t* task = nullptr;
47 };

49 struct NoResult { };
50
51#define SIMPLE_TASK_W_RESULT(NAME, ARGS, RESULT, BLOCK) \
52 struct NAME##Args ARGS; \
53 struct NAME##Result RESULT; \
54 class NAME: public cydui::tasks::simple_task_w_result_t<NAME##Args, NAME##Result> { \
55 logging::logger log {.name = #NAME }; \
56 protected: \
57 void main() override BLOCK \
58 };
59
60#define TASK_W_RESULT(NAME, ARGS, RESULT, BLOCK) \
61 struct NAME##Args ARGS; \
62 struct NAME##Result RESULT; \
63 class NAME: public cydui::tasks::simple_task_w_result_t<NAME##Args, NAME##Result> { \
64 logging::logger log {.name = #NAME }; \
65 protected: \
66 void main() override BLOCK \
67 private:
68
69 template<typename A, typename R>
70 class simple_task_w_result_t: public tasks::task_t {
71 public:
72 typedef A Args;
73 typedef R Result;
74
75 //simple_task_w_result_t() = default;
76 //simple_task_w_result_t(const simple_task_w_result_t<A,R>&) = default;
77 protected:
78 Args args;
79 Result result;
80 Result default_result;
81
82 public:
83 void run(Args _args) {
84 this->args = _args;
85 start(this);
86 }
87
88 void main() override {
89
90 }
91
92 Result* res() {
93 if (is_complete())
94 return &result;
95 else return &default_result;
96 }
97
98 void set_args(Args _args) {
99 this->args = _args;
100 }
101 };
102
103 template<typename A>
104 class simple_t: public simple_task_w_result_t<A, NoResult> { };
105
106#define SIMPLE_TASK(NAME, ARGS, BLOCK) \
107 struct NAME##Args ARGS; \
108 class NAME: public cydui::tasks::simple_t<NAME##Args> { \
109 logging::logger log {.name = #NAME }; \
110 protected: \
111 void main() override BLOCK \
112 };
113
114 void start_thd();
115
116 void start(task_t* task);
117
118 void start_timer(_timer_t* timer);
119
120 template<typename T>
121 concept TaskType = requires {
122 typename T::Args;
123 typename T::Result;
124 //{ T() } -> std::convertible_to<simple_task_w_result_t<typename T::Args, typename T::Result>>;
125 };
126
127 template<typename T> requires TaskType<T>
128 class timer_t: public tasks::_timer_t {
129 T _task;
130 public:
131 void start(
132 typename T::Args _args,
133 std::chrono::duration<long, std::nano> period,
134 int count = -1,
135 bool run_now = false
136 ) {
137 this->period = period;
138 this->count = count;
139 this->run_now = run_now;
140 this->last_time = std::chrono::system_clock::now().time_since_epoch();
141 _task.set_args(_args);
142 this->task = &_task;
143 start_timer(this);
144 };
145
146 typename T::Result* res() {
147 return _task.res();
148 }
149 };
150
151}
